FISSION.description: Explosions from your Exploding ID are twice as big and twice as strong

EXPLOSIVE_IMPACT.description: Your Exploding ID can trigger when hitting mobs with your Main Attack

MAGNET.description: Pulls items within an 8 block radius towards you

PLAGUE.description: Poisoned mobs spread their poison to nearby mobs

HAWKEYE.description: Condense Arrow Storm into a tight beam. Arrows deal ✤10%, ✦1%, and ❋1%

GREED.description: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 15% max health

CAVALRYMAN.description: You may cast spells and attack with a 70% damage penalty while on a horse

GUARDIAN.description: 20% of the damage taken by nearby allies is redirected to you

HERO.description: While under 50% maximum health, nearby allies gain 20% bonus damage and defense

ALTRUISM.description: Nearby players gain 35% of the health you naturally regenerate

ARCANES.description: 30% chance for spells to cost no mana when casted

ROVINGASSASSIN.description: Vanish no longer drains mana while invisible

MADNESS.description: Cast a random ability every 3 seconds

LIGHTWEIGHT.description: You no longer take fall damage

SORCERY.description: 30% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost

TAUNT.description: Mobs within 12 blocks target you upon casting War Scream

RALLY.description: Charge heals you by 10% and nearby allies by 15% on impact, but becomes harmless

CHERRY_BOMBS.description: Turn Smoke Bomb into three firecrackers that fly farther, tighter, and deal high damage instantly

FREERUNNER.description: Double your sprint speed when your sprint bar is under 30%

PEACEFUL_EFFIGY.description: Your totem will last twice as long

FURIOUS_EFFIGY.description: Totem effects are twice as fast, but duration is halved

FLASHFREEZE.description: Ice Snake is instant but has a reduced range

GRAVITYWELL.description: Meteor has increased blast radius and pulls enemies instead

DESC_SNOWYSTEPS.description: Leaves a trail of snow behind you

GEOCENTRISM.description: Aura radiates from you instead of your totem and can be cast anytime

TEMBLOR.description: Bash gains +1 Area of Effect and is 25% faster.

RECKLESS_ABANDON.description: Sacrifice War Scream's defense bonus to give Tempest two extra hits, extra damage, and extra speed

ALTEREGO.description: Awakened can be activated after saving 40% less mana, but its duration is reduced by 25%.

FOREST_BLESSING.description: Your archer summons have increased movement speed, attack speed and vision. Arrow Bomb's damage is reduced by -30% Neutral damage.

SOUL_EATER.description: Devour and Harvester grant double mana, but your maximum Marks are decreased by 1.

STRINGS_OF_FATE.description: Your puppets have a lifetime of 3 seconds, but do double damage with attacks and explosions.

ESCAPE_ROUTE.description: Frenzy and Time Dilation charge twice as fast, but to a halved maximum.

DIVINE_HONOR.description: Increase the bonus from Radiance by 5%. Decrease the Earth damage of Bash by -15%.

GENTLE_GLOW.description: Orphion's Pulse and Fluid Healing restore more health, especially to allies, but at a slower speed.

PERFECT_RECALL.description: Memory Recollection casts an extra spell, but only activates at 150 banked mana.

JUGGLE.description: Stronger Multihit adds an additional 12 hits. All hits are reduced by -10% Neutral damage.

GRUESOME_KNOTS.description: Twisted Tether spends three times as much of your Blood Pool to deal double damage

COAGULATE.description: Blood Connection launches you further and higher upon teleporting to a nearby Totem

DEADWEIGHT.description: Totem's horizontal velocity is greatly increased at the cost of vertical movement

EXPUNGE.description: When using Heal, instead cast one instant pulse that heals 20% of your max health

LUNGE.description: Hop's horizontal velocity is greatly increased

WINDSURF.description: Righting Reflex lasts twice as long and is affected stronger by movement speed

HELLFIRE.description: Bash becomes one giant 250% damage hit, and Boiling Blood burns faster and stronger but can't slow

NAPALM.description: Fire Creep increases Arrow Bomb damage and self-damage, but reduces velocity. Fire Creep damage and radius are increased.

TWISTING_THREADS.description: Tangled Trap ropes are much stronger and max traps increase by 12, but trap and bomb effects are weakened.

LIFESTREAM.description: Increases Blood Sorrow's damage and overhealth, but shortens its duration by 75%.

FIXATE.description: All Winded effects are stronger, but Winded applies slowly

INSOLUBLE.description: Dissolution now lasts 2.5 seconds, but grants only 35% resistance.

EFFLORESCENCE.description: Jasmine Bloom deals increased damage but has reduced vertical range

FIND_THYSELF.description: Masquerade now grants 75 Mana after switching between Masks 3 times.

METEOR_CRASH.description: Burning Sigil deals more damage in a massively increased radius, but lasts half as long.

PERILOUS_FLARE.description: Pyrokinesis moves much slower, but has an increased Area of Effect and +50% Neutral Damage

TOTEMIC_FUSE.description: Totemic Smash doubles in radius and deals extra damage but Totem lasts half as long.

SUBLIMATION.description: Totemic Shatter heals 75% of Regeneration's usual amount, with reduced Totem area of effect

HURRICANES_EYE.description: Violent Vortex applies 2 marks to every enemy it hits.

FALLOUT.description: Bomb Arrow's blast becomes giant. Damage, self-damage, and recoil are severely increased

SEEKING_MODULE.description: Homing Shots track towards nearby enemies much more aggressively.

PARAGON.description: Shield Strike deals 300% Neutral damage. Mantle of the Bovemist's cooldown is significantly reduced, but is limited to one shield charge.

LUSTRATE.description: Heal restores health at a slower rate, but Stronger Sunshower deals +80% Neutral, +40% Water, and +10% Fire damage.

ROCK_SHIELD.description: Arrow Shield's defense is increased by 10%, but its number of charges is reduced by 1.

LAST_RESORT.description: Bloodlust has doubled corrupted scaling and knockback, but deals  -50%  -30%

LOCKDOWN.description: Meteor will snap onto a target in range, regardless of aim.

RUSTED_ICHOR.description: Boiling Blood inflicts increased slowness with a shorter cooldown, but deals no damage

FRENETIC_SPIRIT.description: Guardian Angels deal almost no damage, but shoots faster and expires much slower. Frenzy's cap is increased to 125%.

DISPLACE.description: Wind Slash deals massive knockback to enemies hit by Teleport

TACKLE.description: Flying Kick deals much more knockback and Collide deals much more damage on impact.

FLURRY_OF_BLOWS.description: Turn Double Slice into a 10-hit pummeling of 16% damage per hit

EVERSHOT.description: Arrow Hurricane becomes a consistent, straight stream of arrows with a slower fire rate, dealing greater knockback and double damage per arrow

POWER_FIST.description: Striking enemies with an empty hand greatly knocks them back

VEDETTE.description: Focus is stronger, and caps at 2. Crepuscular Ray can be cast at 2 Focus with decreased Focus drain, launching you into the air and immobilizing you.

HEAT_SHIMMER.description: Your Clones are reduced to a maximum of 1 with no damage penalties and Mirror Image's cooldown is greatly shortened.
